mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NO AS userNo, u.USER_ID AS userId, u.LEVEL_NO AS level, u.USER_DELETE AS isDeleted, u.USER_NAME AS userName, COALESCE(SUM(p.POST_REPORT), 0) AS reportCount FROM TBL_USER u LEFT JOIN TBL_POST p ON u.USER_NO = p.POST_WRITER WHERE u.USER_TYPE != '관리자' GROUP BY u.USER_NO ORDER BY u.USER_NO LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
